title: Task 58

fillInTheBlank.sentence: Well, the documentation says we're starting the _ phase next week, but you mentioned it was the following week.

blanks.feedback: Followed by phase, this represents the part of a project where you check if things are working well.

dialogue.text: Well, the documentation says we're starting the testing phase next week, but you mentioned it was the following week.

description:
The testing phase is a part of a project where you check if everything works correctly. For example, in a project to make a new app, the testing phase is when you try using the app to find and fix any problems. It helps make sure the project is ready and works well.

Listen to the sentence and fill in the blank.
